name: full-stack-open-osa3
description: Exercises for University of Helsinki's Full Stack Open / fullstackopen.com

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd C:/full-stack-open/full-stack-open/osa2/puhelinluettelo && npm run build && cp -r build C:/full-stack-open/full-stack-open-osa3/full-stack-open-osa3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy

author: Solja Virkkunen
